website_summaries.verdict: A reliable and likable midrange phone, the Xperia X stands out for its palm-friendly build and strong camera, but we can't recommend it for US customers.
pros: The Sony Xperia X is a winning compact phone for its high-quality camera and ergonomic in-hand fit
The dedicated camera button gives you a convenient quick-shoot option
cons: Battery life is constrained, and the fingerprint reader won't work on the US version of the phone

customer_reviews.title: Was waiting for a few months before review
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a flagship $600 phone again. Especially if they keep making "midrange" phones like this one. I'm coming from a iPhone 5s and was a little worried. Not about the OS which has been updated to N by the way. The performance is great and the battery lasts more than a day. I have about 40% left the next morning after a full day/eve of use. The size of the phone is perfect and feels very natural. I get people asking me what kind of phone is that? I am liking not being part of the Apple/Samsung crowds. People should start doing some research before just getting what everyone else has.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Y

customer_reviews.title: and had a nice camera. This one checked all three of those ...
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing between the Xperia models for awhile because I'm indecisive. I was in desperate need of an upgrade to my old phone, but I didn't want to drop $500-$600 on a new one. I wanted a phone that ran smoothly, was up to date on Android versions, and had a nice camera. This one checked all three of those boxes. I've had it for a few months now and I absolutely love this phone. Attached is an unedited photo I took using the Sony Xperia X.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Owens

customer_reviews.title: ... phone for 5 months now and I have been pretty impressed. If you want a more reliable phone
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for 5 months now and I have been pretty impressed. If you want a more reliable phone, save up for the more pricy phones that Sony does, but this phone is pretty good for the price. The screen has become pretty scratched, but I have not used a screen protector as the market for cases and screen protectors for this phone are very slim and low quality. Camera is very good, but my only stipulation is that it overheats and shuts off after about 5 to 7 minutes of recording.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia X
customer_reviews.text: Another quality Sony product for my collection. Yes there are some quirks but if you have ever owned anything Sony before you should expect that. I love the build quality of the phone. It's my hi-res audio player, PS4 remote player, really nice mega pixel camera, great triluminous tv, and,oh yeah, phone.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst phone I have ever owned. Has never worked right. Called Sony and they were no help. If phone rings or you call someone the screen goes black. This is my first and last Sony phne.
customer_reviews.author: Rocks Lady

customer_reviews.title: So long Sony!
customer_reviews.text: Well I have been with Sony for awhile now and this was my third phone with them. Within the first two months every external button just stopped working. The power, volume, and camera buttons were all unresponsive. I had to ensure that my phone never died because if it did I would have no way to turn it back on. Needless to say after 3 phones, all with various issues, I have switched to Samsung and I'm very pleased that I did. If you're considering a Sony phone please also consider the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shaw

customer_reviews.title: ... a friend of mine had one and it works great. However when it came it would not set ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone because a friend of mine had one and it works great. However when it came it would not set up, I could not get it to open after setting it up, it kept asking for a pin which I did not put in so it would not take one. Had to reset but since I could not completely charge the phone it would not reset or charge. Sent it back. ordered another, will repost my review after I get the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone ever. Was sick of Samsung, not a huge fan of Apple, so I tried something new. Broke within 3 months. Touch screen just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone and its features .
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Androids finest. Camera quality is amazing. Its so much better than Samsung ang more user friendly than Apple. If you like Android phone this is one you'll love. The screen is so durable. But still best to have a case.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Nice thing - worth the money - Lime Gold theme is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about Sony Xperia X so far - design, performance, and ergonomics Recommended accessory: Xperia X Case, Ringke [FUSION] Crystal Clear PC Back TPU Bumper [Drop Protection/Shock Absorption Technology] Raised Bezels Protective Cover For Sony Xperia X 2016 - Clear Sold by: Ringke Official Store $10.99
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone. Great quality for the price. Durable. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A fan

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for common social apps
customer_reviews.text: Bought one as gift for my BF and he loves it. Aside that the has always liked Sony products, he found the phone to have a lot of capacity to carry his digital music library (with the aid of a MicroSD card). Also, he likes the battery life (no more having to charge the phone twice a day) and that the apps run smoothly without lags or making the phone reboot.
customer_reviews.author: akaiiro

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected for this price range and good pictures
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone has been very responsive and works well for this price range. Pictures are good quality but the zoom is not that good. I would recommend to a friend for sure
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Phone is insane sweet
customer_reviews.text: camera is nuts both of them. I love my phone and the fingerprint reader on the power button... On the side of the phone, yup. So fricking awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John Busch

customer_reviews.title: Don't good for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really one piece the trash, don't work fine, the signal is poor, the camera don't work show me the message one time for use your dispositive is more hot now you need re start, for work, and the GPS don't work appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin Espinel

customer_reviews.title: There is no voice mail or answering service
customer_reviews.text: Im very disappointed that this phone does not have a voicemail or answering machine. I have went on YouTube to figure out how to set it up and it just does not work at all. The icons are there, but do not work, unless im missing something this is not set up friendly and you also have to refer to an online manual.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, even better service from vendor
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone 1 month ago from Focus Camera. I have to say first of all, top notch service from them. Item arrived without hassle to Canada (from America), several days early, and they included a free selfie stick! The phone itself, I'm happy with it, it's exactly as advertised. Camera is nowhere near as good as my LG G4, but overall I like this phone much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this phone. It has had some speed issues lately and the constant updates are messing with everything. I had to toy around with the developer settings to get my music to work on the bluetooth in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Love the features
customer_reviews.text: It heats up so fast when using the camera.then won't allow you to do anything. Love the features, this has really been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: sheuss

customer_reviews.title: worthwhile if you are sony fans
customer_reviews.text: Sony make believe great design doesn't feel hot after normal use battery can support 1.5 day normal use hope sony can unlock the fingerprint feature since there is actually a sensor though disabled by sony.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitian Jin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Bought this phone to use abroad. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Bought this phone to use abroad. Tried using an international sim when I arrived at the airport, and it did not recognize the new network. Supposedly unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these phones!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had to replace them several times but they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine, Impress of Z Internet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything perfect and excellent phone!! I'm really happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolaleee

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as my husband's galaxy 7 but better price
customer_reviews.text: Loving this phone so far. So impressed with the camera! Just as good as my husband's galaxy 7 but better price.
customer_reviews.author: alisa hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smartphone, at the level of the best. Great resolution on the camera. Great applications, technology, service and updates from Sony. Impressive link to televisions, playstations, car radios and other Sony equipment. Ideal size, neither too big nor too small. I have had smartphones Samsung, Motorola, Nokia, Blu, etc ... The Sony Xperia X is an excellent smartphone without having to pay too much and is up to the best, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Héctor Vélez

customer_reviews.title: the cell phone is very good, only that it came without accessories
customer_reviews.text: the cell phone is very good, only that it came without accessories.
customer_reviews.author: gerardo perego

customer_reviews.title: Check to see everything is there
customer_reviews.text: I opened my box and the phone was missing a piece for to insert the SIM card unsure why but unable to use it. So got a new phone. Other wise great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R

customer_reviews.title: Sub par antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Antenna is my only gripe with this phone. Had a 5s for 4 years and it got far better cell/wifi reception. Screen is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Henry Kulczycki

customer_reviews.title: I love my new phone!
customer_reviews.text: So far it works so good. And I like the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: yukiws

customer_reviews.title: Speakers barely work
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a small tablet it's ok but as a phone it's horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I ever had. great price for an amazing phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tomer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Far faster than Samsung J7.
customer_reviews.text: Best $299 I ever spent on a phone. Anyone considering a $200-$300 class phone from T-mobile or AT&T should ignore the carrier choices and buy the far more powerful Experia X.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great it took a lot longer to get than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley St George

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered timely and seems to be an awesome phone so far
customer_reviews.author: Houdeany

customer_reviews.title: the camera is very good and the phone itself is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Incredible phone for the actual price, the camera is very good and the phone itself is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel I.

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera on this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera on this thing! I want to do nothing but take pics and videos all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone but keeps on shutting off whenever im charging it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry John Abaca

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Is a really good phone... Well done by Sony and no faults at all
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: All the best
customer_reviews.text: No review to be made. Device as described and is nice
customer_reviews.author: Duško Angirević

customer_reviews.title: Sony, the one and Only
customer_reviews.text: I owned 2 iPhones before, 4S and 6 which I still use. Also had Samsung. I bought Sony due to their quality. Vaio 10 years old still works like charm. This phone is very easy to use, updates regularly by itself. Camera fantastic best photos I have seen on smartphone. I installed UK software and finger print reading works. Display colors perfectly. Side by side with iPhone 6. Boots up fast, dedicated Camera button etc, etc. I would never by an iPhone ever. So over priced. Sony hands down best phone I ever bought. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. PARLAR

customer_reviews.title: Issues with phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not hold a charge and the screen blanks out repeatedly. Didn't get unbearable until just recently and I am now outside of the return period. So now I am stuck with a phone that doesn't for me. Waste of money, bad purchase. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all-round model!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, and for the price too! Performance is great, but battery life could be slightly better. No fingerprint sensor as it's a US unlocked model, but double-tap to wake and sleep works fine so I don't have to overuse power button. Cameras are excellent, and size and weight is good. Waterproofing like their previous phones would have made it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Faheem Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed With Sony
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older smaller Sony Xperia Z3 Compact. While the screen was better, the camera, which is why I bought it, was no different. Even at a supposedly 23MP. I have no idea why Sony can't make a good camera for their phones. They used to be the best when it comes to electronics, but I guess not any more. No fingerprint scanner like others have mentioned. Very disappointed. My small Xperia Z3 will be my last Sony phone. Their new phones are way over priced for what you get. The new Google Pixel may be my next choice depending on it's reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sieja

customer_reviews.title: Very good device Sony is the best Front camera is amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good device Sony is the best Front camera is amazing also the rear one , screen , ram , processor .... I love it
customer_reviews.author: Yasser E.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good looking item
customer_reviews.text: My first review ever. This is a very good looking item. However, camera overheats so fast that it is worthless. 3 min video and a few pictures is all you get before you get the notification that the camera is overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this phone in November and its been fine until today (February)- It has an exclamation point next ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone in November and its been fine until today (February)- It has an exclamation point next to the signal (not WiFi) and LTE is now flashing and the battery is rapidly draining. I've restarted the phone, turned on and off data, turned on and off WiFi, etc. but nothing helps. Disappointing for a phone that is over $300, only a few months old and has never been dropped, not even a scratch on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Wrong model sent
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry but the item I recieved was not the exact model. instead it is "Xperia X compact".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing, BUT the fingerprint scanner is locked (for US firmware), and that is a major setback.
customer_reviews.author: HeNDriX

customer_reviews.title: for this price it can be better.
customer_reviews.text: Sony is not what it used to be. No IP65 | 68. Case from plastic. It looks weak. No 4k video... for this price it can be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got Sony X about 8 month before. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I got Sony X about 8 month before. The phone have so many different problems during the past 8 months. Today I event can't connect with internet. By the way, I got a Sony Z3+ before this Sony X. However, I return the Z3+ two days after because I can't connect with internet too. I already give Sony for two chances. Now I don't want to wast my money anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CHENG H.

customer_reviews.title: Excelente, I just wanted to know if it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Excelente, I just wanted to know if it comes with a headset.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera never worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought t phone a brand new for thanksgiving camera nvr worked. Bought t phone primarily coz camera was supposed to be gr8. Was not allowed to exchange t phone for same thanksgiving price by amazon
customer_reviews.author: Chetan H J

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t the pressure test in android engineering model itself ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t the pressure test in android engineering model itself.The rear camera has a big problem. In low light and dark condition, the camera just doesn’t work, and the screen keeps showing blue noise-dot. Many support softwares, such as z-device-test and MyAndroid, can’t detect the camera info. When i use Antutu, it shows the rear camera is a 8.3 mega pixel camera. Related to the pressure test, i think the phone might be a assembled phone or a personally refurbished phone. The rom is a third-party rom, not the us original version. And the IMEI is worrg too. So i think it might be a assembled phone, and somehow it goes into Amazon factory.
customer_reviews.author: Guizhen Gu

customer_reviews.title: Receipt of goods and the purchase is not in conformity ...
customer_reviews.text: Receipt of goods and the purchase is not in conformity with the receipt of the z3+ and I bought the SONY X, not how to break the promise and has been the second time! After sale is not to deal with me very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked phone many not work outside US
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone for a niece in Vietnam thinking it's an unlocked phone. However, it does not work in Vietnam. This unlocked phone only works in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Hien Doan

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Phone was cleary used and wont let me log in unless i have previous owner's gmail, which is impossible to get. Terrible purchase and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jafet J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Xperia X but i received a Xperia X compact
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find the package close and the headset .
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed bentaher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Overcharged item and snail-pace delivery despite so called expedited delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I just received this phone today. It is user friendly just like the old Sony Xperia I had. The screen clarity is fantastic and all of the data from my old Xperia transferred flawlessly to the new one. The instructions say that most phones' data, even other brands of phones, can be easily transferred. I will update this review should I notice any problems in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Fey

customer_reviews.title: Top tier feel at a cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone almost 2 years ago and it is still running perfectly. I paid $200 plus tax, and this phone is still better then most new phones. The camera is beautiful, the screen great, and battery time is decent after you play with some setting. The only bad part about this phone is that I had to flash the UK firmware over to enable the fingerprint unlock. Not sure why they have it disabled in the US firmware. If this phone is still for sale and cheap, I strongly suggest it instead of wasting money on a brand new phone and not seeing a single difference in performance.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but Gotham Cells is shipping out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, but Gotham Cells is shipping out the International Dual Sim model F5122. That does not carry a US warranty no matter what they say.
customer_reviews.author: RyRy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. That performs well generally
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. That performs well generally, especially when one considers the price. Color correct screen. The only drawback is night shoots are little too noisy comparred to flagship phones, considering the price difference of 500 dollars thats ok. Also there is no RAW support for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Roustai

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised about how much bang for the buck. Sony should advertise this, they are missing the boat. I use it on tracphone system and it far exceeds my expectations. If you doubt me compare xperia specs to high end others and you will see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: JHr

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on the Sony x even watch YouTube videos this phone lighting fast and camera great bright screen big upgrade from the Sony z3v been needing a upgrade I haven't record any videos yet so cant say much about shaking but one thing is when I open the box I was so happy big sonny fan I personally think sony did a great job great all around phone
customer_reviews.author: GK4

customer_reviews.title: Not!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way the phone looks, how ever I had an issue with the phone constantly telling me to download software. I had to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jessclark9

customer_reviews.title: My second Sony Xperia and it is a fantastic phone, fast
customer_reviews.text: My second Sony Xperia and it is a fantastic phone, fast, sleek and amazingly doesn't heat up at all while charging when removed from its case. The battery life is formidable as is the speed at which it charges, a little over an hour and its to 90%+-. The main camera is hard to beat as well, beautiful image quality.
customer_reviews.author: ms rusk

customer_reviews.title: Great deal... my friends are jealous
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this phone. I refuse to pay $700-$1000at t-mobile for a phone when it is possible to buy an unlocked phone like this. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KBTTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good overall product.
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received didn't have a strong Cellular connection. It would constantly drop connection to 3g or all together. Phone was brand new and seller is great, just a faulty product from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Jpalicki

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, it's fast and display is splendid. Camera is brilliant. Only drawback I would say is the sound quality of the speakers is not very high but if you can get over it, great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Both cell phones I bought are working very fine.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and careful attention. Both cell phones I bought are working very fine.
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Chia Wong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone for my wife & she loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Fidel

customer_reviews.title: Great signal and battery
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, However I will say that due to negative "reviews" on the Internet I was almost afraid to choose this phone. But I have already used it in areas where my previous phone (Motorola X 2014) struggled to maintain a signal, and this works well both for calls and Internet. Indeed where before I couldn't get online reliably at all now I am getting Lte! Under similar use as the Motorola and on the same carrier the battery is lasting longer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei J

customer_reviews.title: We are not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It did not meet my expectation. It warms up quickly. It's warming up even when you have video call. I got it for my wife. We are not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great, excelent display
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.. Some hot when i use for very strongs app. But it is fast. I buy it a promo for $150 in focuscamera.. The best decision i ve been taking.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone, it had a very good camera and it is fast and smooth, but it has blocked the finger print reader, this takes off a good functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Brais

customer_reviews.title: Buggy system
customer_reviews.text: Good camera (not Galaxy or iPhone level but better than most Androids). Battery is AMAZINGand charges super quick. Clean look and decent graphics. I personally like that it is not too big. All that being said I don't think I'll be getting another Sony phone. It has crashed on me three times and froze while running basic apps and I'm not even a multi app running type of user. It's not bad enough that I'll be running to get a new phone anytime soon but I probably won't be keeping this one long either (my ancient LG was more reliable)
customer_reviews.author: Chipped Polish

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia X
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, easy to operate, much nicer than v1 model I previously had. Minor snit, super light, so it can and has flown out of shirt pocket. But overall a X. .
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the market for a phone for awhile, and I didn't want just any other popular phone. I researched and found that the Sony Xperia has one of the best cell phone cameras out there and it uses the Android system. Not only that, it allows you to customize the functions on the phone such as the white balance of the home screen. I love it. The only Cons are the terrible battery life and the phone didn't come with headphones. Other than that, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N.Vu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Why buy anything else. Sony simply does a better job. At half the price of Apple or Samsung, this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life....
customer_reviews.text: The worst battery ever , do not waste your money........
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Best u can find for $200
customer_reviews.text: I updated my xperia XA to android 8.0. It still runs very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Niteesh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera for a phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife. She loves it. Pretty good camera for a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cort Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Undecided....
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned an Xperia z1. I loved the phone, but needed an upgrade. So far, the only issue I've had with this in the first week of use has been overheating whilst charging and using camera at the same time. 😬 I hope it's not a preview of future performance, as the z1 only started acting up after it had been accidently dropped on numerous occasions. Headphones, interestingly, we're not included. Love the ease of the interface, and excellent camera quality. Miss the glass backing.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this smart phone! No one would know that I paid so little for this great phone unless I told them. It is about as fast as an Iphone 7 (in my opinion). The main drawback to this phone is the ridiculous amount of updates you have to do before you can bring it up to current standards. So plan on spending about 4 hours doing this (no joke). The other drawback is that the phone overheats when you are out in the sun on a 90 degree day, so it might slow down when you are outside in the summer. Other than that, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony. I had some problems with my x3 but figured I could have been the phone and decided to give Sony another shot. Mainly because of its camera. However I am sensing Samsung is beating song's butt. They are making it waterproof (which Sony is not doing anymore and why I got my z3) also, it snaps pictures in the dark! . I have a feeling a Samsung will be my next phone if this trend continues. Also there are no accessories widely available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badass Sony Phone !
customer_reviews.text: Phone camed in a great package and on time, and i was lucky that i got a great deal last month on Nov and lol im writing the review now well i took time to write this to help others because i know i how it feels whenever u shop online anyways peace.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jaffery

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cell 4 the price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it's a white face silver back VS the whole phone being white. Phone came as scheduled with accessories , no ear phones. Came with a free gift, selfie stick. Works like a champ, it has the micro Sim card so if you have the standard size, your local carrier should be able to provide you one, AT&T charged me $5 & they made sure phone was working properly. All in all, nice cell, 23mp rear and 13mp front, attractive, light, no contract for $250.
customer_reviews.author: O.TURN

customer_reviews.title: Phone is nice and complete functional
customer_reviews.text: Phone is nice and complete functional, takes good pictures. Only problems are the at the charging port will near accept the the charge from the wrong direction, so you can easily damage the phone if you are not paying attention. Also there is a raise circle in the upper left corner of the screen for NFC which make is impossible to get a tempered glass screen cover to sit complete flush.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal. Cheaper price. Great Build Quality. Best phone for its price.
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Japanese Technology. This is a great phone that is reliable,fast, and obtains both amazing build quality and camera specs. I recommend this phone for anyone not willing to spend $600-700 on an unlocked phone. This is better than the most of the Samsung Galaxy S7 Line. Good Deal
customer_reviews.author: Babacar

customer_reviews.title: Sony smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone so far! Picture quality is by far none compared. Easy, user friendly manipulation throughout phone. Sony is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone recomended
customer_reviews.text: I will give 5 due to my own experience with Sony experience X. I have owned this phone for over 3 months already. And 8 have nothing to complain about. It's fast as expected, good ram, good processor well it is not the highest one but this deserves it. I'm not a gamer at all I have not experienced by that term. It covers my needs.
customer_reviews.author: chuster cortes

customer_reviews.title: Works with t-mobile lte
customer_reviews.text: Re-reviewing after a few months. Very VERY BUGGY phone. Miss my xperia z3, which broke, dearly. I wasted $250 on this thing and now realize i should have gone with huawei. Works with t-mobile lte
customer_reviews.author: Haider

customer_reviews.title: Defective Sony phone. The link GPS coordinate is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Defective Sony phone .The link GPS coordinate is not work. There is breakdown the link so then I touch to link it cannot open in google map. Start from model Z3 and later GPS coordinate link Sony no longer work on Sony. I tried to ask tech support,and send back to sony repair, (I used Xepria Z5 then Xperia XZ)Theey repair and send back same problem remain. Won't work at all. I am fan of Sony Ericsson for many year still XperiaZ, Xperia Z1. And now run away of Sony
customer_reviews.author: T. C

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life!
customer_reviews.text: It is very poor battery life for this fantasy new sony cellphone. It lost 50% battery life overnight as idle time. And very easy lost 70% battery life during 5 hours. I had to disable most Apps, and now the battery life is little bit better. BUT, can we still call it a smart phone without any Apps in order to save the battery life?
customer_reviews.author: HAO

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone one month ago as a birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone one month ago as a birthday gift for my sister. This phone doesn't work not even one time. The phone doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Magg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not come with a finger print scanner as atated in the specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M.

customer_reviews.title: No included earphones, only work with GSM network.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from Focus Camera and it didn't come with the earphones. The photo with wooden background is what it supposed to come with the phone and one on the left is what I received. I have to order a pair of earphones separately, apparently disappointed since this is a gift for my mom and I wanted to make it a perfect combo. Also, the phone only works with GSM network which is so annoying, I tried with a verizon SIM card and it didn't work so I think I should warn people since the feedbacks here are all positive.
customer_reviews.author: Bao Tran

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia X F5121 32GB GSM 23MP Camera Phone - Graphite Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Phone OnlyXperia X
The Sony Smartphone That Sets the Standard for Fast and Intelligent Performance
The intelligent Sony 23MP main camera and 13MP front-facing camera capture stunning pictures. The 5 inch curved edge display has a soft feel yet is durable. The Qualcomm Snapdragon 650 processor enables PS4 Remote Play gaming from any room and a large 2620mAh battery to keep going.

Main Camera: 1/2” 23MP, Sony Exmor RS Sensor , Predictive Hybrid AF. ISO 12800, 24mm Wide Sony G Lens
Front Camera: 1/3” 13MP – Sony Exmor R Sensor, 22mm Wide, ISO 6400
Display: 5“ Full HD 1080p (1920x1080), Dynamic Contrast Enhancer, sRGB 140%, 600cd
CPU/GPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 650, 2x 1.8GHz 4x 1.2GHz, Qualcomm Adreno 510
Memory: 3GB RAM, 32GB Flash memory, Up to 200GB Expandable Memory
Battery: 2620mAh, QNOVO Adaptive Quick Charge Technology
Charger: Quick Charger Included
Android Version: 6.01 - Marshmallow
PS4 Remote Play Compatible: Yes
Sound: Hi-Res Audio, Stereo Speakers, Digital Noise Canceling, DSEE HX, LDAC, AHC
Size: 5.6 x 2.73 x 0.31 in / 5.4 oz
Networks: UMTS HSPA+ 800 (Band VI), 800 (Band XIX), 850 (Band V), 900 (Band VIII), 1700 (Band IV), 1900 (Band II), 2100 (Band I) MHz GSM GPRS/EDGE 850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz LTE (Bands 1,2,3,4,5,7,8,12,17,19,20,26,28,38,39,40,41)
Compatible Networks: with GSM/LTE Networks and cellular network providers utilizing GSM network such as AT&T, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, MetroPCS, Simple Mobile, Brightspot, Net10, h20 Wireless, and Cricket Wireless
Sim Size: Nano Sim
Manufacturer Warranty: 1 year US manufacturer warranty on parts and labor
Fingerprint Sensor not supported

Sony Steady Shot For Smooth Videos
Using Sony’s BIONZ image processor, SteadyShot video stabilization shoots smoother video and minimizes 'shaky cam' effects.

2.5D Rounded Edge Display. Seamless Metal Back
The curved 2.5D glass edge display has a soft feel yet is durable. The unique seamless metal back design is easy to hold, feels solid and wears well.

Game On, Anywhere In the House
PS4 Remote Play lets you access your PS4 console through your smartphone and keep playing from any room.

Long Lasting Battery, Quick Charger Accessory Included
A long lasting 2620mAh battery. Running low on power? Quick Charge technology enables up to 5.5 hours of battery life on 10 minutes of charge with the included Quick Charger accessory.

Fast CPU. Smooth Interface Experience
Qualcomm Snapdragon 650 processor and 3GB RAM means Xperia X delivers fast performance for activities such as PS4 Remote Play gaming and quick multitasking.

5 Inch Display with Brighter Colors
Sony’s Triluminos display technology combined with Dynamic Image Enhancer enables super brilliant colors on this Full HD display, simulating Sony’s BRAVIA TV viewing experience in the palm of your hand.

Listen in Hi-Res with Clear Audio+
Sony’s Hi-Res Audio and Clear Audio+ technologies, allow you to hear audio from your music, videos, and games the way it was meant to be heard.

Unlocked Phone; Flexibility to Choose
Switch between compatible carriers without the hassle of contracts. Without carrier bloatware you have additional storage space on your phone and since your phone isn’t carrier restricted you can maintain your resell value.
feature_bullets: 5.0-inch IPS LCD Capacitive Touchscreen, 1080 x 1920 pixel resolution (~441ppi pixel density) + Scratch-resitant display, Oleophobic coating
Android v6.0 Marshmallow, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8956 Snapdragon 650, Processor: Hexa-Core (Quad-Core 1.4 GHz Cortex-A53 & Dual-Core 1.8 GHz Cortex-A72), GPU: Adreno 510

23 Megapixel Camera with 1/2.3'' Exmor RS for mobile sensor, Predictive Hybrid AF, Laser AF sensor, RGBC-IR sensor, Low-light photography: ISO 12800, 24mm wide-angle G Lens, F2.0, Fast Capture, 5x Clear Image Zoom, The BIONZ for mobile image-processing + 13 Megapixel Front Camera f/2.0, 22mm, 1/3" sensor size, 1080p
Internal Memory: 32GB, 3GB RAM - microSD Up to 256GB
WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot; Bluetooth: v4.2, A2DP, aptX, LE; GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS; NFC: Yes; Radio: FM Radio, RDS; USB: microUSB v2.0, USB Host
